column1: Bundu is located at 23.18°N 85.58°E﻿ / 23.18; 85.58. It has an average elevation of 337 metres (1105 feet). Surya Mandir and Dassam Falls are main attraction and tourist spots.'Statue of ulgulan'(Statue of birsa munda) is under construction near Surya Mandir which will be of about 150 ft tall will also be a tourist attraction in the town.
